records.location_details: The incident occurred close to the Albania-Montenegro border, along a road where the migrant was walking. The location is described as having a railway and a car road visible, with a container nearby. This area is consistent with other reported incidents in North-western Albania, with approximate coordinates showing a maximum distance of 2.5 km among incidents.
records.where_clear: Near Albania-Montenegro border, along a road with railway and a container nearby.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific GPS coordinates were mentioned but redacted in the document. However, the general area is consistently described and cross-referenced with other SIRs, indicating a known approximate location.

possible_violations.legal_basis: Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 of the European Convention on Human Rights (ECHR)

records.context_note: The Fundamental Rights Office assesses that it is likely that the migrant was a victim of robbery, although the involvement of Albanian law enforcement officials in the incident remains unclear. The incident is part of a pattern of systematic exploitation and abuse of migrants by a group of unknown perpetrators in the North-western Albania, near the Albania-Montenegro border. Six similar reports have been received since August 2024.
records.evidence_quote: The Fundamental Rights Office received information from Frontex operational staff about a migrant allegedly being robbed by three men in seemingly Albanian police uniforms on 08/10/2024.
